description: 1 - Demolition of existing single storey rear extension and rear and side walls of rear outrigger at ground floor. 2 - Erection of new single storey side and rear wrap-around extension to existing two- storey mid terraced dwelling. 3 - Erection of loft dormer conversion tmain rear roof slope. 4 - Installation of 1no. new Velux roof window texisting front facing main roof slope. 5 - Installation of 2no. new Velux roof windows to existing side facing roof slope of rear outrigger roof. 6 - Replacement of front and rear cladding to existingside extension at first floor. 7 - Application of thin coat flexible render to front of existing side extension at
site_name: 4 Grosvenor Rise East, Walthamstow, London, E17 9LB
